item.title: My Experience at the Cascadia R Conference
item.description:
The past few weeks have been crazy with finishing final projects and taking final exams for spring quarter. This last week I also took a much-needed break between quarters to road trip to the Canadian Rockies! It was great to recharge with some great hiking around Banff and check out the natural hot springs at Radium Hot Springs.

Here’s one of my favorite photos of the trip:
